title: Act 2005, with the consent of the Minister for Finance, given after consultation
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Contributions and Insurability) (Amendment) (No. 2) (Modifications of 
Insurance) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions 
and Insurability) Regulations 1996 to 2024 may be construed together as one 
and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions and 
Insurability) Regulations 1996 to 2024. 

Commencement

heading: 2. These Regulations shall have effect from 1 October 2024.
text_raw:
2. These Regulations shall have effect from 1 October 2024. 

Interpretation

title: Act 2005, with the consent of the Minister for Finance, given after consultation
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Social Welfare
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Social Welfare 
(Consolidated Contributions and Insurability) Regulations 1996 (S.I. No. 312 of 
1996). 

Modifications of insurance - amendments

title: Act 2005, with the consent of the Minister for Finance, given after consultation
heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended as follows-
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended as follows- 

(a) Each provision of the Principal Regulations specified in column 
2 is amended, on and from 1 October 2024, by the substitution of 
the text referred to in column 4 opposite the mention of that 
provision for the text referred to in column 3 opposite that text. 

(b) Each provision amended under paragraph (a) is amended, on and 
from 1 October 2025, by the substitution of the text referred to in 
column 5 opposite the mention of the provision so amended for 
the text substituted by the amendment under paragraph (a). 

(c) Each provision amended under paragraph (b) is amended, on and 
from 1 October 2026, by the substitution of the text referred to in 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [534] 3 

column 6 opposite the mention of the provision so amended for 
the text substituted by the amendment under paragraph (b). 

(d) Each provision amended under paragraph (c) is amended, on and 
from 1 October 2027, by the substitution of the text referred to in 
column 7 opposite the mention of the provision so amended for 
the text substituted by the amendment under paragraph (c). 

(e) Each provision amended under paragraph (d) is amended, on and 
from 1 October 2028, by the substitution of the text referred to in 
column 8 opposite the mention of the provision so amended for 
the text substituted by the amendment under paragraph (d). 

(f) 

In this article, a reference to a column is a reference to a column 
of the Table to this article.

title: Act 2005, with the consent of the Minister for Finance, given after consultation
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to give effect to increases in all PRSI rates 
provided for in the Social Welfare (Consolidated Contributions and Insurability) 
Regulations 1996 (S.I. No. 312 of 1996) over the period 2024 to 2028. The 
Regulations cover contributions relating to PRSI Classes B, C, D, E, H, and J. 

The rate of contribution in each PRSI Class will increase in each contribution 
year by: 

2024 0.1 percentage points 

2025 0.1 percentage points 

2026 0.15 percentage points 

2027 0.15 percentage points 

2028 0.2 percentage points 

These increases will be effective from 1st October in each year. 

Similar increases in respect of the PRSI Classes provided for in the Social 
Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 are provided for in the Social Welfare 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [534]
